meanings.definition: A person who is a member of a group or organization and has special knowledge or access to information.
meanings.sent1: The insiders at the club knew all the secret handshakes.
meanings.sent2: The insiders in the company were aware of the upcoming changes.
meanings.sent3: The insiders whispered about the surprise party, trying not to spoil the secret.
meanings.sent4: She felt like an insider in the world of fashion, knowing all the latest trends.
meanings.sent5: The insiders guarded the ancient treasure with their special knowledge.

meanings.definition: Information known only to a select group of people.
meanings.sent1: The insiders shared details about the new product launch.
meanings.sent2: The insiders were privy to classified information.
meanings.sent3: The insiders joked about their exclusive knowledge, feeling like spies.
meanings.sent4: The secret recipe was only known to a few insiders in the family.
meanings.sent5: The insiders held the key to unlocking the mystery with their hidden information.
